main event: A visual observation of a UFO by a civilian in Burnham, Illinois, where two objects were reportedly seen.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3-5 minutes,The UFOs appeared to move from the horizon to directly overhead and back,The phenomenon gave off a steady white light surrounded by a bluish halo,The observer described the size of the UFOs as being about the size of a dinner plate,No photographs or physical evidence were collected.
witness description: civilian observer with no known occupation
